overview: Join "Lord" Alfred Hayes for an exclusive look at several rarely seen battles, including Bret Hart challenging Ric Flair for the WWE Championship. Plus, Yokozuna gives some insight into his unique diet, The Bushwhackers do some remodeling, and much more!
tagline: Body Slamming, Head Hammering World Wrestling Federation Action!!
title: WWE Smack 'Em, Whack 'Em
